data.title: Everett Penn Sr. Obituary 2021
data.meta_description: Everett Louis Penn, Sr., son of Louis Penn and Loye Etta Miller Penn, was born July 6, 1952, in Syracuse, Kansas, and departed this life Wednesday, November 24, 2021, at his hom...
data.text:
Everett Louis Penn, Sr., son of Louis Penn and Loye Etta Miller Penn, was born July 6, 1952, in Syracuse, Kansas, and departed this life Wednesday, November 24, 2021, at his home near Mansfield, Missouri, at the age of 69 years, 4 months, and 8 days.

On May 22, 1979, he was united in marriage to Rhonda Rae Hamill in Great Bend, Kansas, and to this union five children were born.

He was raised in southwest Kansas and pipelined in Oklahoma, Kansas, Texas, and moved to Mansfield in 1993.

In his spare time, he loved raising chickens, geese, pigeons, or any type of poultry.

Everett was a hard-working man that loved his family, and he will be deeply missed.

He was preceded in death by his mother, sisters, Etta Collen, and Debbie Lou.

Everett is survived by his father, Louis Penn of Brownfield, Texas; his wife, Rhonda, of the home; three sons, Everett Penn, Jr. and wife, Neva, of Mansfield, Edward Penn of New Jersey, and Adam Penn of Brownfield, Texas; two daughters, Gina Myers, and Jessica Barrett and husband, Clinton, all of Mansfield; twelve grandchildren; four great-grandchildren (and two more on the way); four brothers, Howard Penn of Mansfield, Kenneth of Macomb, Oscar Penn and Floyd Penn both of Brownfield, Texas; sister, Ida Langhennig of Brownfield, Texas; many nieces, nephews, other relatives and friends.
